issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
1) Install xCode 4.2 beta
2) Launch Studio in the noted environment
3) Have or create a simple mobile project
4) Use run configuration to target a 4.3 simulator
5) Launch simulator

Results:
App crashes on launch.  A few seconds later, the simulator crashes.

Notes:
Does not occur when using the same configuration on Lion.
On 10.6.7 targetting the iOS 5.0 simulator works as expected.
fields.summary: Application and Simulator crashes sequentially when launched from xCode 4.2
fields.environment: 10.6.7, xCode 4.2, iOS 4.3, [INFO] Titanium SDK version: 1.7.1 (06/13/11 15:33 84a68cc...), Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201106141356

comments.body: Closing due to time passed and lack of progress and input.
